title: The GAME, not the client, isn't opening.
body:
So recently I upgraded to windows 10, and I had just finished updating everything and all that (drivers and things) when a friend of mine ,Ghostuser, decided to call me on Razer comms to play a game of league. 

Everything was OK for a bit, we searched for a game and got one and the champion select screen popped up. I selected whoever it was and waited......

The reconnect screen popped up and an error (unfortunately i didn't record this).

I didn't think too much of it so I re-downloaded the game and thought it would go away. It didn't.

A new problem arose. 
Now i don't even get an error or the reconnect screen. Just nothing after Champion select. 



Does anyone know what it could be?

replies.body:
This sound an awful lot like your connection to the servers is unstable, causing this issue. I'd suggest trying all the steps listed inside our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as your next step since this is most often caused by conflicting network settings.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
